class neuralhedge.data.base.HedgerDataset(prices: Tensor, info: Tensor, payoff: Tensor)ïƒ

Bases: Dataset

Dataset contains data for hedging

Parameters:

  • information (torch.Tensor)

  • payoff (torch.Tensor)

Shape:

  • information: (n_samples, >= n_steps , n_features)

  • payoff: (n_sample,)

Parameters:

  • n_timestep â€“ number of timestep

  • sigma â€“ volatility
